pregnant women with suspected or confirmed COVID-19 
• Pregnant women with confirmed COVID -19 infection should be managed at the appropriate level of care, as
determined by the severity of their COVID-19 disease and her obstetric indications.
• All designated birthing sites should be able to identify potential COVID -19 cases, test for COVID -19, identify
women with severe COVID-19 disease, and manage deliveries with asymptomatic or mild COVID-19 disease.
